# cook your code here
n=input()
x=len(n)
no=list(map(int,n))
temp=[0]*x
if (x>2):
 sum=99
 for i in range(3,x):
  sum=sum+90
 sum=sum+10*(int(n[0])-1)
 sum=sum+int(n[1])
 f=int(n[0])%10
 
 s=int(n[1])%10
 
 cd=s-f
 
 temp[0]=n[0]
 temp[1]=n[1]
 for i in range(2,x):
  nxt=(s+cd)%10
  temp[i]=(chr(nxt+48))
  s=nxt
 temp=list(map(int,temp))
 if(temp<=no):
  sum=sum+1
 print(sum)
else:
  print(n)
